nodes.text: Thared was a male Barabel and Master of the Imperial Knights who served the Galactic Federation Triumvirate following the Second Imperial Civil War. He served at the battle of the Floating World, acting as one of the Triumvirate's commanders under Empress Marasiah Fel.
The character Thared is named after brothers Jared and Theo Peppard, two Star Wars fans who met Corinna Bechko and Gabriel Hardman, the authors of the Star Wars: Legacy Volume 2 comic book series.
